snippet.title: CLOUD ESCAPE - Official Indie Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
➤ Get CLOUD ESCAPE: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1731120/Cloud_Escape/

My indie game CLOUD ESCAPE is now available on Steam! 

A stylized 3D precision platformer where every mistake will be punished. Are you destined to escape the clouds?

Twitter: https://twitter.com/anbagames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/anbagames
Discord: https://discord.gg/G8SMR6T2Gb

Longer description:
What started as a simple game jam project transformed into a full-fledged video game. Cloud Escape is a stylized 3D precision platformer where every mistake will be punished. The game world features different themed areas, each of which offers unique scenery, mechanics, obstacles and traps. Are you destined to escape the clouds?

About:
Welcome to my channel. In real life I'm a software developer and in my free time I create video games. This channel shows my progress in the shape of devlogs and other gamedev related videos. Have fun here!

#anbagames #andreasbaum #gamedev #indiegame #gamedevelopment #indiedev #unity #unity3d #madewithunity #devlog #gametrailer #trailer
